title: Week 18 Matchups + Wheel of Shame, Bottle Your Pain - Fantasy Football Podcast for 1/7
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! Follow & subscribe for year-round fantasy football podcasts! On today’s show, lots of Week 18 matchup breakdowns with playoff motivation levels, and injury updates. Plus, Jason spins the Wheel of Shame! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for January 7th, 2022.
  
 (05:55) - FootClan Friday
 (07:20) - NFL News
 (12:35) - Fantasy Forecast 
 (12:50) - Titans at Texans
 (19:50) - Saints at Falcons
 (25:05) - Jets at Bills
 (27:10) - 49ers at Rams
 (32:50) - Patriots at Dolphins
 (37:50) - Seahawks at Cardinals
 (42:05) - Panthers at Buccaneers
 (47:00) - Wheel of Shame
 (52:40) - Chargers at Raiders
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show
 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
  
 Check out today's sponsors:
  
 Fantasy Champs -- Code: FREERING
 Pristine Auction -- Registration Code - BALLERS
 Support this podcast 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
